com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bp5Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bp5Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Bp5Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the BP5

    The class provides methods to control BP5 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a BP5 device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new BP5 device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect BP5 device.

        Parameters:
        com - class for communication.
        context - Context.
        mac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        type - valid Bluetooth name.
        baseCommCallback - communication callback.
        insCallback - Bp5 device callback.
